name: Enlargement Pills
description:
Made in 8 hours. GDL Jam Entry. 

A-D or Arrow Keys to move left and right, Hold Left Click to attack. Get a Special Mode at 50 pills. Kill Doctors to get pills. This game can be run infinitely even after you reach the required pills until you want to kill your evil brother.

For Replayers: Press Spacebar to skip the intro.
